name: Organization Ontology
description: Core organization entity definition for identifying and managing organizations within the platform ecosystem. Provides foundational entity that all other ontologies reference.

entities.name: Organization
entities.description: Core organization entity representing any business or entity within the platform ecosystem. Maps directly to schema.org Organization.

oaa:properties.name: legalName
oaa:properties.description: Official legal name if different from display name

oaa:properties.name: type
oaa:properties.description: Organization's relationship type to the platform

entities.name: OrganizationContext
entities.description: Rich context data associated with an organization including market positioning, strategic objectives, and operational details.

oaa:properties.name: contextId
oaa:properties.description: Unique identifier for the context record

relationships.name: Has Context
relationships.description: Links organization to its rich context data containing market positioning and strategic information

relationships.name: Is Client Of
relationships.description: Organization is a client of another organization, typically representing an agency-client relationship

relationships.name: Is Competitor Of
relationships.description: Organization competes with another organization in the same market space

relationships.name: Is Partner Of
relationships.description: Organization has a formal partnership relationship with another organization

relationships.name: Is Affiliate Of
relationships.description: Organization is an affiliate or referral partner of another organization

businessRules.name: Unique Organization ID
businessRules.description: Each organization must have a unique organizationId
businessRules.action: THEN its organizationId MUST be unique across all organizations

businessRules.name: Type Determines Relationships
businessRules.description: Organization type constrains which relationships are valid
businessRules.action: THEN the Organization MUST NOT have an isClientOf relationship

businessRules.name: Required Fields
businessRules.description: All required fields must be populated
businessRules.condition: IF an Organization entity is created
businessRules.action: THEN organizationId, name, type, industry, size, and status MUST be provided

businessRules.name: Status Validation
businessRules.description: Status must be a valid enum value
businessRules.action: THEN it MUST be one of: active, inactive, archived

changeControl.changeNotes: Upgraded from legacy format to OAA v5.0.0 JSON-LD compliance. Added OrganizationContext entity for graph connectivity.
